name: 6a2a7792-0e2d-4284-a35d-3fe4fc4d28bc
displayName: Happy Path - User wants to know about Covered services(FAQ)

text: Hi, I'm your virtual healthcare agent. I can help answer your healthcare claims questions, understand your benefits, and find a doctor. How can I assist you today?

A covered service is the type of care that is covered under your plan. Some types of care may not be a covered service and therefore the plan doesn’t reimburse anything regardless of whether it's in network or out of network.

For example: A covered service does not mean free, it means your benefits including your deductible and/or co-pay apply when seeking that service. Different plans may choose to cover different services such as fertility.

I can further help you and answer your questions about your benefits plan, healthcare claims and assist you to find a doctor.

Okay, glad I could help. A transcript of our conversation will be stored in the messages section of your patient portal. Press 5 if you’re willing to fill out a survey on your experience today. Have a great day!
